text: The Chilean Communist Party (Proletarian Action) (Spanish: Partido Comunista Chileno (Acción Proletaria) PC(AP)) is a non-registered hard-line communist political party in Chile. It was founded in November 8, 1979 and its first secretary is Eduardo Artés. == Ideology == The party believes in classical Marxism–Leninism. The party is highly critical of the more known Communist Party of Chile and its moderate views. == Representation == The party has no parliamentary representation due to their non-registered status. == Other websites == *PC(AP) Official website Category:Communist parties Category:1979 establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Chile Category:Political parties in Chile
